hours.description: Initial research and project creation
Continue preliminary work on Eve
Initial Bitbucket commit.  unit tests; work on idea project; test project generally
Create spec, Postman Testing
Add Team Entity and Test; create hours.
Wrestle with an Eve configuration issue
Solve Eve configuration issue.  Preliminary bootstrap styling.  Fix paths to static and template files.
Rework packages yet again.  Tests still hosed at this point.  Initial work on authentication, using alguitos as test endpoint.
Begin writing auth tests.  Write function to encode basic auth headers.  Exercise Docstring mojo Remove settings.py in favor of inline settings in App. Preliminary Team+Password auth class.
Demo Ipython notebooks for testing/documentation.  Rework people resource to begin using it as “User”.
Create common unit test / integration test helper.  Begin work on integration test, SetupDemo.  Lot of good learning.
Attempt to get authentication to work cleanly for superuser (site admin, god).  Moving in different direction.

Set up Jinja templates including default layout, jquery version of active tab logic, and demo Flask session use, preliminary login and register pages.  Rework jquery version of active tab logic to Jinja to avoid flashing.  Create controllers package (really Jinja views); begin moving view code there.
Incorporate Angular.js, with basic routing in place.  Still deciding on Angular Single Page App versus Jinja.
Begin work on registration data model unit test and class.

Work on registration page including Ajax call to verify team name; figure out how to get test request context (See TestHelper.test_request_context), and use this in new Auth test for now.  Additional methods on registration model.
Work on wiring up registration view to model
Continue wiring up registration view to model
Registration view, registration model work.
Better integration for SQLAlchemy, plus basic login working using flask-login + wtforms. Nice!
Work on fixing login bug; refactor auth into a Blueprint
Fix for login bug – working reasonably well now but need to get rid if blank password for logged in user.
Refactoring, incorporate large app structure with config file, app factory, etc., and improve use of Blueprints.
Re-incorporate Goalboost schema, rework unit tests.
Use Flask-Security, replacing existing work on Flask-Login
Continue Flask-Security work
More flask-security work, now using Flask-Security, but more customization & cleanup to do!
Flask security customize login page somewhat.
Redo schema Flask-Security + timer + task.
Flask security / email configuration & testing.  Test basic signup (no confirmation yet).
Remove some sensitive information from repo.
Continue removing sensitive stuff; rework for mongodb, replacing mysql in flask-security
Rework unit tests – passing under mongo.  Review flask-security datastore as basis for our models.
Work on new mongo models, tests.
Continue work on models and tests.
Install and configure production MongoDb.  Work on application's mongoDBb configuration.
Timer model work, with some mongoengine document learning curve.
Begin UserTimer business object and tests
Continue UserTimer.  Working timer, tests, testing in shell as well.
Begin implementing basic formatting for Timer class to support CodeSolid billing, etc.  Also work on early version of product roadmap (on CodeSolid site)
User and Timer RESTful API work.  Basic brain-dead get in place.
Continue work on RESTful API for timer
Continue work on timer PATCH method, also single contributor hours timer
Work on deployment of pre-alpha version to public site
Continue deployment work
Continue working to solve problems with deployment - some progress
Deployment work, get mongo auto-restarted, verify connection, fix index.py issue, fix flask security in production.  Awesome!
Consolidate production fixes and improve deployment files to make them more like dev environment
Timer improvements; production work to consolidate dev / production
Refactor packages alguito and mod_*, UI fixes, validate eariler consolidation by redeploying to production
Incorporate foundation (css framework)
Timer UI work; begin timer UI.  Merge foundation.  Incorporate basic Angular into default.html and timer ui (Proof of Concept).
Timer UI work
UI work - 45 minutes of encoding hell
More UI work - angular timer page
Timer UI work - foundation, styling timer row, rearrange page elements
Timer UI, foundation modal dialogs, etc.  Need more work on default layout.
Dev page - working on user / timer RESTful API
Timer UI / Timer API.  Improve production experience such as it is to date
Timer API work - development page
Timer API work
API work; to_json/ from_json on timer
More timer api work; dictionary interface in / out for timer object.  Finish get with :timerid
Security test token auth
Refactor timer structure - daily entries
Timer and API work
Import tool for current hours, timers post method.
